com.gallagher.security.mobileaccess

Class MobileAccessProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gallagher.security.mobileaccess.MobileAccessProvider

  • public class MobileAccessProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides instances of the Mobile Access API.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public static MobileAccess configure(android.app.Application application,
                                     java.lang.String databaseFilePath,
                                     java.lang.String unlockNotificationChannelId,
                                     java.lang.String bleServiceForegroundNotificationChannelId)
        Use this method to configure the SDK before calling getInstance(). It is not possible to re-configure the SDK once this has been called.
        Parameters:
        application - The android Application object
        databaseFilePath - You may specify a custom file path and name for the Mobile Access SDK database. If existing registrations exist, changing the database file path will make them unavailable. Make sure the database file path stays the same once deployed to user devices. A default name of 'com.gallagher.security.mobileaccess.db' is used if null is passed in for this parameter.
        unlockNotificationChannelId - Channel Id to use for local notifications to prompt the user to unlock their phone
        bleServiceForegroundNotificationChannelId - Channel Id for the persistent "Scanning for Doors" BLE notification

      • configure

        public static MobileAccess configure(android.app.Application application,
                                     java.lang.String databaseFilePath,
                                     java.lang.String unlockNotificationChannelId,
                                     java.lang.String bleServiceForegroundNotificationChannelId,
                                     CloudTlsValidationMode cloudTlsValidationMode,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> config)
        Use this method to configure the SDK before calling getInstance(). It is not possible to re-configure the SDK once this has been called.
        Parameters:
        application - The android Application object
        databaseFilePath - You may specify a custom file path and name for the Mobile Access SDK database. If you decide to specify a custom file path, it is recommended to put it under the Android NoBackupFiles directory - accessed via context.getNoBackupFilesDir(). If existing registrations exist, changing the database file path will make them unavailable. Make sure the database file path stays the same once deployed to user devices. A default name of 'com.gallagher.security.mobileaccess.db' is used if null is passed in for this parameter.
        unlockNotificationChannelId - Channel Id to use for local notifications to prompt the user to unlock their phone
        bleServiceForegroundNotificationChannelId - Channel Id for the persistent "Scanning for Doors" BLE notification
        cloudTlsValidationMode - Use to override the default cloud server certificate validation procedure. Not recommended.

      • getInstance

        public static MobileAccess getInstance()
